drv_eth_vga_capture.v

00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief DM9000A 10/100 Mbit Ethernet driver for a VGA frame grabber 
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief drv_eth_vga_capture.v
00030 */
00031 module drv_eth_vga_capture(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input           clk_30,
00035     input           clk_25,
00036     input           reset_n,
00037     //% @}
00038     
00039     //% \name Captured VGA output signals

00040     //% @{
00041     input           display_valid,
00042     input [9:0]     vga_r,
00043     input [9:0]     vga_g,
00044     input [9:0]     vga_b,
00045     //% @}
00046     
00047     //% \name DM9000A Ethernet hardware interface

00048     //% @{
00049     output          enet_clk_25,
00050     output          enet_reset_n,
00051     output          enet_cs_n,
00052     input           enet_irq,
00053     
00054     output reg      enet_ior_n,
00055     output reg      enet_iow_n,
00056     output reg      enet_cmd,
00057     inout [15:0]    enet_data
00058     //% @}
00059 );
00060 assign enet_clk_25  = clk_25;
00061 assign enet_reset_n = reset_n;
00062 assign enet_cs_n    = 1'b0;
00063 
00064 reg tx_active;
00065 
00066 reg enet_data_oe;
00067 reg [15:0] enet_data_out;
00068 assign enet_data = (enet_data_oe == 1'b1)? enet_data_out : 16'bZ;
00069 
00070 //************ packet Ethernet and IP/UDP header contents ROM
00071 reg [5:0] ram_addr;
00072 wire [15:0] ram_q;
00073 
00074 altsyncram ethernet_ram_inst(
00075     .clock0(clk_30),
00076     .address_a(ram_addr),
00077     .q_a(ram_q)
00078 );
00079 defparam
00080     ethernet_ram_inst.operation_mode = "ROM",
00081     ethernet_ram_inst.width_a = 16,
00082     ethernet_ram_inst.widthad_a = 6,
00083     ethernet_ram_inst.init_file = "drv_eth_vga_capture.mif";
00084 
00085 //************ vga burst fifo
00086 reg [8:0] vga_line_number;
00087 reg last_display_valid;
00088 reg [1:0] select_line;
00089 reg block_wrreq;
00090 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00091     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00092         vga_line_number <= 9'd0;
00093         last_display_valid <= 1'b0;
00094         select_line <= 2'd0;
00095         block_wrreq <= 1'b0;
00096     end
00097     else begin
00098         last_display_valid <= display_valid;
00099         
00100         if(fifo_empty == 1'b0 && last_display_valid == 1'b0 && display_valid == 1'b1)   block_wrreq <= 1'b1;
00101         else if(display_valid == 1'b0)                                                  block_wrreq <= 1'b0;
00102         
00103         if(display_valid == 1'b0 && last_display_valid == 1'b1) begin
00104             if(vga_line_number == 9'd479)   vga_line_number <= 9'd0;
00105             else                            vga_line_number <= vga_line_number + 9'd1;
00106         end
00107         
00108         if(display_valid == 1'b0 && last_display_valid == 1'b1 && vga_line_number == 9'd479) select_line <= select_line + 2'd1;
00109     end
00110 end
00111 
00112 wire fifo_wrreq = (fifo_empty == 1'b1 || last_display_valid == 1'b1) && block_wrreq == 1'b0 && display_valid == 1'b1 && select_line == vga_line_number[1:0];
00113 wire start_load = fifo_empty == 1'b0;
00114 
00115 wire fifo_empty;
00116 wire [11:0] fifo_q;
00117 
00118 scfifo vga_fifo_inst(
00119     .clock(clk_30),
00120     .data( { vga_r[9:6], vga_g[9:6], vga_b[9:6] } ),
00121     .wrreq(fifo_wrreq),
00122     .rdreq(fifo_rdreq),
00123     
00124     .empty(fifo_empty),
00125     .q(fifo_q)
00126 );
00127 defparam
00128     vga_fifo_inst.lpm_width = 12,
00129     vga_fifo_inst.lpm_numwords = 1024;
00130 
00131 reg fifo_rdreq;
00132 reg [1:0] fifo_rd_cnt;
00133 reg [11:0] last_fifo_q;
00134 
00135 //************
00136 
00137 reg [15:0] state_counter;
00138 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00139     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00140         state_counter   <= 16'd0;
00141         tx_active       <= 1'b0;
00142         
00143         enet_iow_n      <= 1'b1;
00144         enet_ior_n      <= 1'b1;
00145         enet_cmd        <= 1'b0;        // low: INDEX, high: DATA
00146         enet_data_oe    <= 1'b0;
00147         enet_data_out   <= 16'd0;
00148         
00149         ram_addr        <= 6'd0;
00150         
00151         fifo_rdreq      <= 1'b0;
00152         fifo_rd_cnt     <= 2'd0;
00153         last_fifo_q     <= 12'd0;
00154     end
00155     else if(state_counter == 16'd50000) begin
00156         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00157         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00158         enet_data_oe <= 1'b1;
00159         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'hFF }; // set IMR(FFh = 0x80)
00160         
00161         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00162     end
00163     else if(state_counter == 16'd50002) begin
00164         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00165         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00166         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h80 }; 
00167         
00168         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00169     end
00170     else if(state_counter == 16'd50005) begin
00171         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00172         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00173         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h1F }; // power-up PHY (1Fh = 0x00)
00174         
00175         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00176     end
00177     else if(state_counter == 16'd50007) begin
00178         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00179         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00180         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h00 }; 
00181         
00182         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00183     end
00184     
00185     else if(state_counter == 16'd50010) begin
00186         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00187         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00188         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h31 }; // set checksum reg (31h = 0x05)
00189         
00190         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00191     end
00192     else if(state_counter == 16'd50012) begin
00193         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00194         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00195         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h05 }; 
00196         
00197         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00198     end
00199     
00200     
00201     else if(state_counter == 16'd50018) begin
00202         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00203         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00204         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'hF8 }; // set MWCMD(F8h = 16-bit data) 
00205         
00206         ram_addr <= 6'd0;
00207         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00208     end
00209     else if(state_counter >= 16'd50020 && state_counter <= 16'd50060 && state_counter[0] == 1'b0) begin
00210         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00211         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00212         enet_data_out <= ram_q;
00213         
00214         ram_addr <= ram_addr + 6'd1;
00215         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00216     end
00217     else if(state_counter == 16'd50062) begin
00218         if(start_load == 1'b1) begin
00219             enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00220             enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00221             enet_data_out <= { 7'd0, vga_line_number };
00222             
00223             fifo_rdreq <= 1'b1;
00224             fifo_rd_cnt <= 2'd0;
00225             state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00226         end
00227     end
00228     else if(state_counter == 16'd50063) begin
00229         enet_iow_n <= 1'b1;
00230         fifo_rdreq <= 1'b1;
00231         last_fifo_q <= fifo_q;
00232         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00233     end
00234     
00235     
00236     else if(state_counter >= 16'd50064 && state_counter <= 16'd51022 && state_counter[0] == 1'b0) begin
00237         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00238         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00239         
00240         if(fifo_rd_cnt == 2'd0)     enet_data_out <= { fifo_q[3:0], last_fifo_q }; 
00241         else if(fifo_rd_cnt == 2'd1)enet_data_out <= { fifo_q[7:0], last_fifo_q[11:4] };
00242         else                        enet_data_out <= { fifo_q, last_fifo_q[11:8] };
00243         
00244         if(fifo_rd_cnt == 2'd2) fifo_rdreq <= 1'b1;
00245         else                    fifo_rdreq <= 1'b0;
00246         
00247         fifo_rd_cnt <= fifo_rd_cnt + 2'd1;
00248         last_fifo_q <= fifo_q;
00249         
00250         if(state_counter == 16'd51022)  state_counter <= 16'd60016 - 16'd1;
00251         else                            state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00252     end
00253     else if(state_counter >= 16'd50064 && state_counter <= 16'd51022 && state_counter[0] == 1'b1 && fifo_rd_cnt == 2'd3) begin
00254         enet_iow_n <= 1'b1;
00255         fifo_rdreq <= 1'b1;
00256         last_fifo_q <= fifo_q;
00257         fifo_rd_cnt <= 2'd0;
00258         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00259     end
00260     else if(state_counter >= 16'd50064 && state_counter <= 16'd51022 && state_counter[0] == 1'b1) begin
00261         enet_iow_n <= 1'b1;
00262         fifo_rdreq <= 1'b1;
00263         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00264     end
00265     
00266     
00267     else if(state_counter == 16'd60016) begin
00268         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00269         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00270         enet_data_oe <= 1'b1;
00271         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h02 }; // read TX(02h bit 0 == 0)
00272         
00273         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00274     end
00275     else if(state_counter == 16'd60018) begin
00276         enet_ior_n <= 1'b0;
00277         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00278         enet_data_oe <= 1'b0;
00279         
00280         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00281     end
00282     else if(state_counter == 16'd60020) begin
00283         enet_ior_n <= 1'b1;
00284         tx_active <= enet_data[0];
00285         
00286         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00287     end
00288     else if(state_counter == 16'd60022) begin
00289         if(tx_active == 1'b0)   state_counter <= 16'd60118;
00290         else                    state_counter <= 16'd60016;
00291     end
00292     
00293     else if(state_counter == 16'd60118) begin
00294         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00295         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00296         enet_data_oe <= 1'b1;
00297         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'hFC }; // set TXPLL(FCh = low byte)
00298         
00299         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00300     end
00301     else if(state_counter == 16'd60120) begin
00302         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00303         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00304         enet_data_out <= { 8'h00, 8'hEC }; 
00305         
00306         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00307     end
00308     
00309     else if(state_counter == 16'd60123) begin
00310         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00311         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00312         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'hFD }; // set TXPLH(FDh = high byte)
00313         
00314         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00315     end
00316     else if(state_counter == 16'd60125) begin
00317         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00318         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00319         enet_data_out <= { 8'h00, 8'h03 }; 
00320         
00321         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00322     end
00323     
00324     else if(state_counter == 16'd60128) begin
00325         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00326         enet_cmd <= 1'b0;
00327         enet_data_out <= { 8'd0, 8'h02 }; // write TX(02h = 0x01)
00328         
00329         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00330     end
00331     else if(state_counter == 16'd60130) begin
00332         enet_iow_n <= 1'b0;
00333         enet_cmd <= 1'b1;
00334         enet_data_out <= { 8'h00, 8'h01 }; 
00335         
00336         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00337     end
00338     
00339     else if(state_counter == 16'd60132) begin
00340          state_counter <= 16'd50018;
00341     end
00342     
00343     else if(state_counter <= 16'd60132) begin
00344         enet_iow_n <= 1'b1;
00345         enet_ior_n <= 1'b1;
00346         fifo_rdreq <= 1'b0;
00347         state_counter <= state_counter + 16'd1;
00348     end
00349     
00350 end
00351 
00352 endmodule
